### PsyBot {#psybot}



PsyBot is an AI tool run by the school which gives _structured_ and _tailored_ feedback for students on our programmes.

Enrolled students can request a login here: [https://psybot.llemma.net/](https://psybot.llemma.net/)

Staff can also request a login link at the same address, and will be able to see work uploaded by students.
